evidence.text: a. A declaration that the June 7, 2025 Presidential Memorandum calling into Federal service members and units of the National Guard under 10 U.S.C. § 12406 and Secretary Hegseth's June 7 and June 9 Orders (and any future orders) calling the California National Guard into service under the stated authority of the President’s use of 10 U.S.C. § 12406 are unauthorized by and contrary to the laws of the United States;

evidence.text: b.
